{{Infobox Berry |name = #66 Starf |image = [[File:Starf.png]] |caption = This Berry is considered a mirage. It was said to be so strong that it had to be abandoned at the world's edge. |growtime = 1d |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*30 spicy *10 dry *30 sweet *10 bitter *30 sour }} '''Starf''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least 1 empty plot while encountering a shiny wandering Pok√©mon. At least one [[Berries#Gen 4 Berries | Gen 4]] or [[Berries#Gen 5 Berries | 5]] berry must be unlocked to unlock this berry. It emits an aura that increases [[Shiny Chance]]. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 5 days |- ! Animation |

5 days ||
--- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 16 hours -
80 hours ||
192 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
53 hours 20 mins ||
128 mulch |} === Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your farm in the following way to have the best chance to obtain Starf berries. Note that the setup omits a 24th [[Roseli]], as that would allow [[Custap]] berries to mutate, which would occupy the empty plots. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Roseli.png|30px]]

[[Roseli]] |} ==== Important Notes ==== If possible, it is highly recommended to obtain at least 8 Passho berries prior to obtaining the Starf Berry mutation. Without any Passho berries surrounding the Starf plot, harvesting a Starf plant ('''Even with a rich mulch applied''') will only ever yield 1 Starf Berry. Furthermore, harvesting a single ripe Starf berry with the maximum yield modifier (surrounded by ripe Passho berries (8 spots) and with a rich mulch applied to the plot it is on) will still only yield 8 Starf berries. It is necessary to use a combination of Passho berries and Ripe Mulch to increase the total amount of Starf berries one has (excluding finding additional Starf berries randomly or using the Enigma berry). {{Berries}}
